name: Black Coin
description:
Black Coin (BLK) - Empowering Minority Businesses

Black Coin (BLK) is a utility-driven cryptocurrency designed to support and empower minority-owned businesses by providing innovative funding solutions. Operating as a decentralized financial tool, Black Coin combines the power of crowdfunding and peer-to-peer lending, allowing entrepreneurs to access capital without the barriers of traditional banking.

Key Features:
	•	Crowdfunding Platform – Businesses can raise funds directly from the community through blockchain-backed campaigns.
	•	Lending Utility – Enables decentralized lending, allowing investors to support small businesses with transparent, smart contract-based loans.
	•	Community-Driven – Built to uplift minority entrepreneurs by providing an inclusive financial ecosystem.
	•	Secure & Transparent – Uses blockchain technology to ensure secure, tamper-proof transactions with full transparency.

With a fixed total supply of 50,000,000 BLK, Black Coin is structured to create long-term value while fostering financial inclusion. By leveraging blockchain technology, Black Coin aims to redefine access to capital and build generational wealth for underrepresented
